channel.title: Comments on: Lotusphere sessions on MP3

item.title: By: Kary Forth
item.dc:creator: Kary Forth
item.description: <p>The website also says:<br /><br />"...Details about how and where registered attendees gain access to these valuable assets will be communicated to you on-site at the conference via your Lotusphere Online mail account..."<br /><br />It's now Jan. 25th & I still haven't received a single email in my Lotusphere online account. Here's an idea, just send attendees a normal friggin email.</p>
item.content:encoded:
The website also says:

“…Details about how and where registered attendees gain access to these valuable assets will be communicated to you on-site at the conference via your Lotusphere Online mail account…”

It’s now Jan. 25th & I still haven’t received a single email in my Lotusphere online account. Here’s an idea, just send attendees a normal friggin email.

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Patrick,<br /><br />It does say on the site that the MP3s are for registered attendees only but I'm there'll be a healthy Pirates Bay market for them <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /><br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Patrick,

It does say on the site that the MP3s are for registered attendees only but I’m there’ll be a healthy Pirates Bay market for them http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />

Matt

item.title: By: Patrick Kwinten
item.dc:creator: Patrick Kwinten
item.description: <p>Forget to say that I hope these mp3's will be available at the ITunes store??? <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded: Forget to say that I hope these mp3’s will be available at the ITunes store??? http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif“ />

item.title: By: Patrick Kwinten
item.dc:creator: Patrick Kwinten
item.description: <p>I think this is great for people who have to stay home this year!<br/><br /><br/><br />(including me <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GHL/$File/sad.gif"</a> /> )<br/><br /><br/><br />Sometimes spoken words between the text in a presentation saves you a lot of time trying to figure out what that speaker is meaning (mostly the say that things on the sheet will be made clear later in the presentation, hahaha)</p>
item.content:encoded:
I think this is great for people who have to stay home this year!

(including me http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GHL/$File/sad.gif“ /> )

Sometimes spoken words between the text in a presentation saves you a lot of time trying to figure out what that speaker is meaning (mostly the say that things on the sheet will be made clear later in the presentation, hahaha)

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>I suspect that it's harder to organise this for the BP track as there are so many non-IBM-ers involved but I agree that is my favourite track as well. Hopefully this is a precursor to the whole conference being MP3'd for next year.</p>
item.content:encoded: I suspect that it’s harder to organise this for the BP track as there are so many non-IBM-ers involved but I agree that is my favourite track as well. Hopefully this is a precursor to the whole conference being MP3’d for next year.

item.title: By: Curt Stone
item.dc:creator: Curt Stone
item.description: <p>I have mixed emotions. The best sessions are the Best Practices sessions and I don't see them included in this announcement. <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GHL/$File/sad.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded: I have mixed emotions. The best sessions are the Best Practices sessions and I don’t see them included in this announcement. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GHL/$File/sad.gif“ />
